_EFI_HASH_PROTOCOL Struct Reference


Data Fields

EFI_HASH_GET_HASH_SIZE GetHashSize
EFI_HASH_HASH Hash

Detailed Description

This protocol allows creating a hash of an arbitrary message digest using one or more hash algorithms.
